A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a sci-fi movie\, it's fun if you don't think too much.  Once you get past the cool action scenes though\, the many plot holes and pointless scenes to pad the runtime really ruined it for me.  If you're a Star Wars fan\, you'll dislike it even more.  Little to no character development and conflicting moments with what was already established in the Star Wars universe.  Overall\, disappointing\, to say the least.
